name: Bouncing Marble
description:
In Bouncing Marble, you control a little red marble through hand built mazes, bouncing from walls, collecting coins, destroying enemies, avoiding dangerous obstacles and trying to reach the exit as soon as possible. You need to find best solutions and have good reflexes to finish each level with a perfect score. 

- Many coins, shields, ammos and keys to collect.

- 20 specially designed levels.

- Art work inspired from 90's arcade games.

- 29 achievements.

- A funky original soundtrack.
